snippet.title: [Speer DX] | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Grab your speer and puzzle-platform your way through 125 levels!

[Speer DX] is an improved and expanded version of the original game [Speer]. The core concept remains the same: Throw your speer into walls to use it as a platform, and make your way through puzzle rooms filled with switches, doors, teleporters, bubbles, sponges, portals and more.

The DX version adds 20 levels, new stage gimmicks and brand-new gameplay features to make the game more balanced and accessible (see below). The graphics have also been improved, and some of the level names are now funnier. I think.

GET THE GAME HERE!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1945800/Speer_DX/
